full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MI CHEN SKAR LNGA'I BSKANG BSHAGS GSOL MCHOD KYI CHO GA NYIN GYI BYA NA MTSAN GYI MEL TSE 'DOD DON 'GRUB BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES PA MI CHEN SKAR MA LNGA'I, ,BSKANG BSHAGS GSOL MCHOD @006A *, ,KYI CHO GA ,NYIN GSUM BYA RA MTSAN GSUM GYI, ,MEL TSE 'DOD DON 'GRUB BYED 'DI, ,SKU 'BUM BYAMS GLING AAN JA SU, ,MER GEN MKHAN POR GRAGS PA 'AM, ,MING GZHAN MCHOG SPRUL SU MA TI, ,SANGG'A SHA SA RATNA YIS, ,CAN CUN SE TSEN PE'I LE'I GA-YON, ,CHOS GRVA BLO CHEN GLING NYID DU, ,SBYAR BA'I YI GER BRI MKHAN NI, ,DGE SLONG DNGOS GRUB RDO RJE'O,, ,,)
